Bob's Steak & Chop House | Austin Barton Creek
A World-Class Steakhouse
Complementing the Austin Hill Country
Boasting a welcoming culinary team, Bob’s Steak & Chop House of Austin Barton Creek is located inside the Omni Barton Creek Resort & Spa. Paying homage to the area’s Western roots, furnishings include historic flags and a wall of classic Texas cattle brands to represent the state’s rich history of cattle culture.
HOURS OF OPERATIONS
Mon - Sat
/ 5:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Order Online
Location Map
Where You'll Find Us
Within the Omni Barton Creek Resort & Spa, this steakhouse location pays homage to the area’s western roots with historic flags and a wall of classic cattle brands.
8212 Barton Club Dr,
Austin, TX 78735
(512) 306-5830
Our Menu
GROUP START
Private Dining
Host an Event
Get Together
Bob’s in Austin will customize your experience for any private event and make it remarkable. Expect the absolute best for your guests, including an award-winning wine list, a customized or a la carte menu, and private dining rooms available.
View Floor Plan

Our Team
Crafting Every Taste
Chris Tosch
General Manager
Contact
Daniel Kauffman
Chef
Originally from Philadelphia, Chef Daniel has a background in fine dining, and now dedicates his time and discipline to ensure an optimal culinary experience at Bob’s Barton Creek. Over the course of Chef Daniel’s career, he has studied & worked alongside highly accredited chef mentors. Daniel had the privilege of cooking at the James Beard House when one of his mentors was a James Beard Award winner.
In Daniel’s spare time he loves to “sharpen” his knife skills, truly dedicated to his craft.
Contact
